links.*: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (extended edition)

wikitext.*:
'''Cirith Ungol''' means "Spider's Cleft" in [[Sindarin]] and can refer to:
==Middle-earth==
* [[Cirith Ungol]], a pass through the [[Ephel Dúath]] into [[Mordor]].
* The [[Tower of Cirith Ungol]], a tower above Cirith Ungol in which [[Frodo Baggins]] was imprisoned. 
* The [[Stairs of Cirith Ungol]], the stairs which led from [[Minas Morgul]] to Cirith Ungol.
* The [[Battle of Cirith Ungol]], a battle between two groups of [[orcs]] which resulted in [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]]'s rescue.
==Chapters==
* ''[[The Stairs of Cirith Ungol]]'', the eighth chapter of the fourth book in ''[[The Two Towers]]''.
* ''[[The Tower of Cirith Ungol]]'', the first chapter of the sixth book in ''[[The Return of the King]]''.
* ''[[Kirith Ungol]]'', the eighth chapter of Part II of ''[[The War of the Ring]]''.
==Adaptations==
* ''[[The Stairs of Cirith Ungol (scene)]]'', the twenty-third scene of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King'' (extended edition)]].
* ''[[The Tower of Cirith Ungol (scene)]]'', the fifty-eighth scene of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King'' (extended edition)]].

==Popular culture==
* [[Cirith Ungol (band)]]
